org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication

Class ReplicationUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.ReplicationUserData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisableReplicationUserData, EnableReplicationUserData, InitializeAllReplicationUserData, InitializeReplicationUserData, PurgeHistoricalUserData, StatusReplicationUserData

    public abstract class ReplicationUserData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store the information provided by the user in the replication command line. It is required because when we are in interactive mode the ReplicationCliArgumentParser is not enough.
